News.Title: Le Merite Exports Reports Mixed H1 Results with Profit Growth Despite Revenue Decline
News.Summary: Le Merite Exports reported H1 EBITDA of 133 million rupees compared to 61 million rupees in the previous year. The company's EBITDA margin improved to 6.3% from 2.3% year-over-year. Net profit increased to 85 million rupees from 28 million rupees in the prior year period. However, revenue declined to 2.13 billion rupees from 2.6 billion rupees year-over-year.

News.Title: Le Merite Exports Plans Share and Warrant Issue
News.Summary: Le Merite Exports has announced plans to issue 86,400 equity shares and 1,037,000 convertible warrants. Both the shares and warrants will be priced at 320 rupees each.
